title: Since Varus' story has been rewritten, I'd love for there to be a Dark Knight Champion
body:
I've always had an interest in the "Dark Knight" archetype ever since Final Fantasy 4: a noble character who takes on a dark power to protect others, but may damn themselves in the process. Varus used to do this, though not for noble reasons (he just wanted revenge), and now he's all Darkin stuff. As for Kassadin, his lore is too old, so I say he doesn't count.

To that end, I'd absolutely love it if we had a new Champion, preferably a Demacian, who ends up filling the Dark Knight niche. The whole "Dark Is Not Evil" thing would be a really nice theme to explore.

**Lore**
This champion is the son of a rich physician and philanthropist that was the owner of one of the biggest corporations in Demacia and tried to use the power of his company to save the city for the loomng dark. When he was a child, he witnessed the murder of his father and mother that were killed by a mugger (which was later revealed to be a plot by the League of Assassins to eliminate one of the most prominent person that was trying to save a city that was on the verge of being consumed by darkness, but in the end the death of this person turned out to unite the city), and this tragedy was the motivation for the kid to became the Dark Knight to swear revenge end eradicate evil from Demacia
He is mostly known for his scientific knowledge, athletic prowess and detective skills; he use the fortune he inherited and the advanced hextech technologies developed by his corporation to develop various amount of gadgets and vehicles that he can use in battle. He has also extended experience in martial arts and is one of the best in hand-to-hand combat. It is said that with enough time to prepare, he is capable to come out with a plan to defeat even god-level enemies

Yeah, I have never seen a character like that before in games
